title: not every  game is winable

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
this is my most recent ranked game and this has been the thing that made me realize you cant carry solo 100% and that you cant win every game 
match history isnt working so here is the screen shots
http://imgur.com/a/7CxLI

replies.body: I cant see it, just blank for me. But you can win most games. Just played my provisionals on my smurf and got 9 wins, placed me in gold 2 :D. Carried everygame hard

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XtQcATuO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-17T13:58:51.834+0000)
>
> I cant see it, just blank for me. But you can win most games. Just played my provisionals on my smurf and got 9 wins, placed me in gold 2 :D. Carried everygame hard

oh ok well i went 19/8/1 with 100% kill particapation
how did you only get 175 master points for fizz? Seems like a jip
Of course not.  Anyone that thinks you should or will win 100% of your games is delusional.  No one, in any sport or game, wins 100% of the time, nor should you.

Luck of the draw

I just JG in my last ranked and finished 11 / 1  / 16

Why?

Because top mid and adc crushed their opponents making it ridiculously easy for me. Heck i was pretty much redundant and not required for the win.

Just luck, those three could of been on the other team.

And its not just match maker. Game before last the sole Gold5 player in the game decided to shaco jg and fed hard and went salty. Can't match make that.

So at lower ranks luck is the deciding factor IMHO. as 1/10th of the players involved it is so damn hard to swing a win.

(have seen it happen, a vi jg just snowballed the game so hard and won in 25min)
